articles.title: Russian Strike on Ukrainian Pension Center Kills Dozens
articles.summary: A **Russian** guided bomb struck a pension distribution center in eastern **Ukraine**, killing **24 people**. The attack hit the village near **Sloviansk**, about **24 kilometers** from the city center. President **Volodymyr Zelenskyy** urged allies to increase pressure on **Moscow** to end the ongoing war.

articles.title: Apple Unveils Ultra-Thin iPhone 17 Air Amid Market Pressures
articles.summary: **Apple** revealed its **iPhone 17** lineup including the ultra-thin **iPhone 17 Air** measuring just **5.6mm** thick. CEO **Tim Cook** presented the devices at **Cupertino** headquarters, aiming to boost upgrades amid **AI** competition and **US tariff** pressures affecting the smartphone market globally.

articles.title: Anglo American and Teck Resources Announce Historic Mining Merger
articles.summary: **Anglo American** and **Canada's Teck Resources** plan to merge in the mining sector's **second-largest** deal ever, creating a company worth over **$53 billion**. The **London-listed** and **Canadian** miners expect regulatory approval to take up to **18 months** before finalizing this historic combination.

articles.title: China Consumer Prices Fall as Deflation Concerns Deepen
articles.summary: **China's** consumer price index dropped **0.4%** in **August** year-over-year, exceeding economists' forecast of **0.2%** decline. The **National Bureau of Statistics** data shows persistent **deflation** in wholesale prices as **Beijing** faces mounting pressure to boost sluggish domestic demand and weakening export growth.

articles.title: Nepal Prime Minister Resigns After Violent Social Media Protests
articles.summary: **Nepal's** Prime Minister **KP Sharma Oli** announced his resignation **Tuesday** following violent unrest over a repealed **social media ban**. The protests in **Kathmandu** entered their second day, originally sparked by government corruption concerns and the since-reversed ban on major platforms, forcing the leader's sudden departure.

articles.title: French AI Startup Mistral Secures Massive ASML Investment
articles.summary: **French AI** startup **Mistral** received **‚Ç¨1.3 billion** ($1.5 billion) from Dutch chip giant **ASML** in a **$2 billion** funding round. **ASML**, valued at **$308 billion**, now owns approximately **11%** of Mistral, becoming the **European** OpenAI competitor's largest shareholder in this strategic investment.

articles.title: FDA Approves Human Trials for Pig Kidney Transplants
articles.summary: The **FDA** has approved human trials for **pig kidney transplants**, advancing xenotransplantation science significantly. This breakthrough allows scientists to study longer-term organ viability in humans, potentially addressing the critical shortage of donor organs. The approval marks a major leap forward in cross-species transplantation research.

articles.title: Australia Approves World's First Koala Chlamydia Vaccine
articles.summary: **Australia** has approved the world's first **chlamydia vaccine** for **koalas**, developed by **University of the Sunshine Coast** scientists over more than a decade. The vaccine aims to curb the epidemic devastating the **endangered** marsupial population, offering hope for conservation efforts across the country's eastern regions.

articles.title: Trump Administration Reverses Major Climate Science Policies
articles.summary: President **Donald Trump's EPA** announced proposals to reverse environmental protections, weakening **US climate science** capabilities. The administration's war on climate research affects **NOAA's National Hurricane Center** in **Miami** and other critical agencies, undermining America's ability to track and respond to extreme weather events nationwide.

articles.title: Gold Prices Hit Record Highs as Investors Flee Dollar
articles.summary: **Gold prices** surged to **all-time highs** as global investors seek safe haven assets, abandoning the **US dollar**. The precious metal's rally continues despite **stock markets** also hitting new peaks, signaling unusual market dynamics. **Perth Mint** reports unprecedented demand as the new gold rush shows no signs of slowing.
